actions.text: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 198 (Roll no. 412).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Norton.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 198 (Roll no. 412).

description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 116-126 to prohibit the use of funds from being used to relocate the National Institute of Food and Agriculture or the Economic Research Service outside of the National Capital Region.
purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 116-126 to prohibit the use of funds from being used to relocate the National Institute of Food and Agriculture or the Economic Research Service outside of the National Capital Region.
